= authorsearch =

List of authors that talk about the query. The list is sorted by frequency of posts and the influence of authors. 

== Parameters: ==

|| *Name*  || *Required* || *Description* ||
|| q       || required   || Search query string. ||
|| window  || optional   || Time window for results. (default: 'a') Options: `auto` - automatically pick the most recent and relevant window. `h` last hour, `d` last day, `w` last week, `m` last month, `a` all time ||

Accepts [ResListParameters List Parameters]

== Example: ==

{{{
http://otter.topsy.com/authorsearch.json?q=nosql
}}}

This will fetch search results in json format for authors who talk about "nosql" the most.
